posts.post_content:
I have for sale the following 8 T206 HOFers, all graded SGC 50 (4).  All are very nicely centered and present well.  I thought I would try to list them here before going to eBay, therefore I have priced these lower than VCP considering that I don’t have to pay any eBay seller fees.  You save money, I save fees.  All the backs are clean.  Scans of the back are available upon request, but I will not hold a card.  In other words, if you ask for a back scan and someone else commits to the card before I am able to provide the scan, the one who first committed to the card gets it.  All prices include shipping.  Since I’ve priced these lower than VCP, and the shipping is included, I ask that payment be made via PayPal gift.  If you’re uncomfortable with that, regular PayPal is fine, but please add 3%.  

*** SOLD*** Fred Clarke - Holding Bat - Sweet Caporal 150
VCP $180 / Your price $167
[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/Pre-War%20Cards/T206ClarkeHoldingBat.jpg[/IMG]

Vic Willis – Portrait - Piedmont 150
VCP $182 / Your price $169
[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/Pre-War%20Cards/T206Willis.jpg[/IMG]

Chief Bender - Pitching, With Trees in Background - Piedmont 350
VCP $202 / Your price $185
[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/Pre-War%20Cards/T206BenderPitchingwithTrees.jpg[/IMG]

***SOLD*** Mordecai Brown - Chicago On Shirt - Sweet Caporal 350
I believe the VCP data to be wrong for this card.  It shows a recent sale of $1015 and therefore escalated the average sale price.  I’m guessing the VCP to be in the $200 ballpark.  Your price $183
[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/Pre-War%20Cards/T206BrownChicagoonShirt.jpg[/IMG]

***SOLD*** Addie Joss – Pitching - Sweet Caporal 350
VCP $159 / Your price $148
[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/Pre-War%20Cards/T206JossPitching.jpg[/IMG]

***SOLD*** Joe Kelley - Sweet Caporal 350
VCP $138 / Your price $129
[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/Pre-War%20Cards/T206Kelley.jpg[/IMG]

***SOLD*** Iron Man McGinnity - Sweet Caporal 350
VCP $153 / Your price $143
[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/Pre-War%20Cards/T206McGinnity.jpg[/IMG]

***SOLD*** John McGraw - Glove At Hip - Sweet Caporal 350-460
VCP $203 / Your price $185
[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/Pre-War%20Cards/T206McGrawGloveatHip.jpg[/IMG]

If you feel I've made an error in pricing, just let me know and I'll take a look at it.  No further discounts will be given.  If you buy more than one card, I can knock off another $3 or so since I'm saving on combined shipping, but that is pretty much it.  Thanks for looking!

Beautiful cards, David :D

If my funds weren't limited right now, I would already bought a few from you...more than fair on the prices.  Good luck with the rest of these!
I'll take the Brown - pm sent!

Thanks to all who have purchased.    

Only Bender, Kelley and McGinnity remain.
Willis portrait and Bender still available.  Others are sold.

All cards were shipped today.  Buyers have been given tracking numbers.  

Bender and Willis left.  One small price bump before eBay.

Bender $179
Willis $163
Monday morning bump.  Willis and Bender remaining.  Going to eBay tonight.

Willis and Bender moved to eBay...

[url]http://www.ebay.com/sch/vintagetoppsguy/m.html?_ipg=50&_sop=12&_rdc=1[/url]
I'll take the last 2 Hall Of Famers from you. Thanks, David
Bump for a great guy, collector and friend!  Davud is a top notch person to deal with.
